description: This file defines the SettingsViewModel class, which manages user settings data and interactions for the Android application. It interacts with a repository to retrieve and update user settings, and exposes state flow for observing changes.

classes.name: SettingsViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel class that handles user settings data, providing functions to start and update settings, and maintaining reactive state flows.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Retrieves the latest user settings from the repository and updates the internal state.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates user settings in the repository and refreshes the internal state, also reboots the repository to apply demo mode or auto-connect changes.
